Exaggerate: The claim may be considered an exaggeration as it states that the takeover of Rutgers Camden will cost New Jersey billions without providing concrete evidence or official estimates.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no official cost estimate provided to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that George Norcross made the statement about the cost of the takeover, but there is no direct evidence or confirmation of this.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the cost of the takeover, such as funding sources or potential benefits, that are not explored in the claim.
